titleInfo.title: Prototypical Components of Honeybee Homing Flight Behavior Depend on the Visual Appearance of Objects Surrounding the Goal

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Braun, E., Dittmar, L., Böddeker, N., Egelhaaf, M.: Prototypical Components of Honeybee Homing Flight Behavior Depend on the Visual Appearance of Objects Surrounding the Goal. Frontiers in Behavioral Neuroscience. 6, 1-16 (2012).
